mapper.select: /* cart.listCart */ SELECT cartID , p.productID , c.userid , name , productName , count , price , (price * count) money FROM MEMBER m, CART c, PRODUCT p WHERE m.userid = c.userid AND c.productID = p.productID AND c.userid = #{userid} ORDER BY cardID
SELECT NVL(sum(price * count), 0) FROM CART c, PRODUCT p WHERE c.productID = p.productID AND userid = #{userid}
SELECT productName , sum(price * count) money FROM CART c, PRODUCT p WHERE c.productID = p.productID GROUP BY productName ORDER BY productName
